title: Calculate MC and ATC from variable cost table

content.question: Assume that the fixed cost is $50. Based on the cost and output data in the table above, what is the marginal cost when the firm increases its output from three to four units and the average total cost of producing 4 units?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
